Give your puppy a space where they can rest and relax after a long day of playing or secure flaps with our hook and loop closure design to allow your pet to enter and exit as they please.

Each crate cover reflects a love for dogs while providing a practical, stylish solution for crate-trained pets.

Complete any room in your home with our coordinating room decor such as window treatment panels, throw pillows, bedding sets, hampers, wall decor, sheet sets, shower curtains, memo boards and more.

name: Friends Forever Metal Dog Crate Cover 36 inch, Dog Cage Cover w/Roller Shades, Machine Washable, Trucker Black
short_description: The dog crate cover blocks light and provides a dark privacy, security environment for your dog to sleep, also fends off nasty, unpredictable spills and splashes.
Dog kennel cover/dog crate cover with roller shades to adjust visibility and ventilation and large opening allows easy access to front and side doors.
The dog cage cover blends seamlessly with your home décor, neat and clean.
The cage cover for dog crates is machine wash cold and tumble dry low for convenience.

The durable pet crate cover is fit most 30”, 36”, 42” and 48” dog crates. 30.5"Lx19.5"Wx21"H cover up 30” crate, 36.75"Lx23.75"Wx25"H cover up 36” crate, 42.75"Lx28.75"Wx30"H cover up 42” crate, 48.75"Lx30.75"Wx32.5"H cover up 48” crate.
product_description: Elevate your pet's comfort and security with our premium Friends Forever Metal Dog Crate Cover. This 36-inch cover is meticulously designed to fit most 36-inch dog crates, providing a cozy, private sanctuary for your furry friend. The durable, machine-washable cover in Dark Grey features a solid, allover jacquard fabric made from 100% polyester, ensuring easy cleanup and longevity. The crate cover blocks light, offering a dark, secure environment for your dog to sleep, while also protecting against spills and splashes. Equipped with roller shades, you can adjust visibility and ventilation as needed, with a large opening allowing easy access to front and side doors. Measuring 36.75"L x 23.75"W x 25"H, this crate cover seamlessly blends with your home decor, maintaining a neat and clean appearance. Suitable for large dog breeds up to 45 pounds, this crate cover is an excellent choice for indoor use, promoting a peaceful and secure environment for your pet.

name: Molly Mutt Wild Horses Dog Crate Cover, 100% Cotton Canvas Cover with 2 Roll-Up Panels, Ideal for Dog or Cat Crate, Durable, Washable, and Free of Harmful Chemicals, 24" x 18" x 21"
short_description: Dog Crate Cover - Don't hide your dog's wire crate, match it to your sense of style with a Molly Mutt crate cover. This dog cage cover measures 24" x 18" x 21", and features our stylish Wild Horses print

Dog Kennel Cover - We never use any harmful chemicals, or fire retardants, so this dog kennel cover is safe to use for your four-legged friend. This kennel cover provides a cotton canvas barrier that blocks light, and breathes, allowing air to flow through the crate

100% Cotton and Machine Washable - This dog cage cover is made from 100% high-end quality cotton to make it comfortable for your pup. This cotton canvas material is pre-shrunk and machine washable for ease of care

Front and Right-Side Panels - This cover for dog crates has front, and right-side panels that roll up and down. This arrangement lets you use either door on the crate without any hassle – simply roll a panel up for full visibility
Privacy, Security and Comfort - Dog cage covers provide the comfort, security and privacy your four-legged best friend instinctually desires. Give your dog a crate covered with style and comfort
product_description: A dog crate cover gives your four-legged best friend the privacy they need and desire. Don't Hide Your Dog’s Wire Crate Match it to your sense of style with a Molly Mutt crate cover. Your dog is a beloved part of the family — so give them a cozy place to rest at night, or whenever a nap comes calling! Our crate covers are made from durable 100% cotton canvas that breathes while blocking out light. Mix, Match or Coordinate Choose from hundreds of combinations to make the perfect comfy home for your pup. Pairing a dog bed duvet cover with a crate cover is a great way to bring both style and comfort to your dog’s crate. Up, Down, Up & Down. It’s Up to You. The Molly Mutt crate cover has front and right-side panels that roll up so you can use either door on your crate. No need to move your crate to use this crate cover. A Statement Piece With 20 patterns to choose from you can turn that ugly wire crate into a featured piece in any room. Make it stand out with a bright color, or blend in with a dark geometric design. This cover for dog crates measures 24" x 18" x 21", and it’s free from any harmful chemicals and fire retardants, making it safe for your entire family.

name: Pet Dreams Dog Crate Cover - Breathable Fabric Kennel Topper for Single-Door Crates, Fits iCrate Dog Cages 18, 24, 30, 36, 42, 48 Inches (Ivory, Small, 24")
short_description: 𝐁𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐃𝐨𝐠 𝐂𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫: Tested and Certified Best Air Flow. Most Dog Crate Covers are polyester coated with toxic PVC that are Not Breathable despite false claims. Our Covers were ASTM D-737 tested by an accredited laboratory and had the highest air flow score. They are made for Indoor use and are never coated for maximum ventilation. WARNING: Never completely close your Crate Cover as it blocks airflow and creates a low oxygen environment which is not healthy for your dog

𝐌𝐚𝐝𝐞 𝐖𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐅𝐚𝐛𝐫𝐢𝐜 𝐍𝐨𝐭 𝐏𝐨𝐥𝐲𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐂𝐨𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐈𝐧 𝐏𝐕𝐂: A Fitted Crate Cover is a nice upgrade from putting a Blanket, Sheet, or Towel over your crate. Our lightweight Cotton Dog Crate Cover is available in Denim or Beige, while our soft plush covers come in White, Blue, Grey, and Pink. Our Color selection will complement your home and create a cozy den that your pup will love!

𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐂𝐡𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐬 𝐍𝐨𝐧 𝐓𝐨𝐱𝐢𝐜 𝐌𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐬: Make the Healthier Choice for Your Pet and a Safer Choice for the Environment. Certified by OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100, this Kennel Cover is free from harmful substances like Phthalates, PVC, and Lead, and doesn´t have any toxic chemical warning labels making it a pet friendly choice for responsible pet owners.

𝐅𝐢𝐭𝐬 𝐌𝐢𝐝𝐖𝐞𝐬𝐭 𝐌𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐢𝐂𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐃𝐨𝐠 𝐂𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐬: Choose from a Single Door or Double Door Dog Crate Cover. The Single Door has an Open Front feature to provide proper ventilation and a view for your pet, while the Double Door is versatile and can be used with both a Front or Side Opening Crate. Available in sizes X Small, Small, Medium, Large, X Large, and XX Large.

𝐖𝐚𝐬𝐡𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐌𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞: Our Kennel Covers are 100% Machine Washable, unlike windproof and waterproof Crate Covers that are plastic and only wipeable. Made from premium fabrics that withstand repeated washings, our covers won’t pill, shed, or mat, ensuring long-lasting quality with minimal upkeep.
